# CSAND
A simple, grid-based sand
simulation.

pronounced "sand"
_NOT_ made in C, made in C++ using
the raylib framework.

Some dependencies are included. The
ones that aren't included are 
automatically added by the cmakelists
file in the `cmake` directory.

---

Dominic Kolp - Lead Programmer
cjk          - Playtester

--- 

Check out the official Crunchy Games
Discord server! It has news on the
game's development, and releases.
